p: For, the H 2O 2 scavenging assay polyphenols of the extracts may donate electrons to neutralize H 2O 2 into water. We observed that BP (64.47 ± 0.35%) contained significantly higher (p = 84 × 10 −6) H 2O 2 activity than BM, though BM possessed higher H 2O 2 scavenging activity than BF but the difference was statistically insignificant (p = 0.06). Similarly, BH (59.34 ± 0.39%) and BS (59.46 ± 0.18%) treatment impart statistically insignificant (p = 0.83) differences for the H 2O 2 activity. A similar trend for H 2O 2 activity was reported by Novaković et al. (2011) among fresh, air dried, and freeze dried raspberry.
